title: Constitutional

en: You've been working for most of the past few days, and it's starting to show up as aches and pains in your body. But you have a deadline coming up and know you can't afford a day off. How do you deal with this?

no_caption: Do some stretches and get back to work

en: You take a long walk around the neighborhood to clear your mind. It helps, and you are more energetic and productive when you get back to work.
You stretch your muscles, and while it helps for a bit, they start to ache again in another hour or so. You accept the pain and try to work around it.
